title: endless loop in abs() for uint8_t
body_html:
My compiler (Apple LLVM version 8.1.0 (clang-802.0.42) complained about this, but I think it's reasonable. In the specialization THCNumerics<uint8_t> the abs-function is defined in a selfrecursive way
ie

uint8_t abs(uint8_t a) { return abs(a); }

Because an uint8_t has no sign it should imo defined as

uint8_t abs(uint8_t a) { return a; }
